name: generate_gauge_chart
description: Generate a gauge chart to display single indicator's current status, such as, CPU usage rate, completion progress, or performance scores.

value.description: Current value of the indicator, such as 75.

data.description: Data for gauge chart, such as, [{ name: 'CPU使用率', value: 75 }]. Multiple gauges can be displayed.

height.description: Set the height of the chart, default is 600px.

max.description: Maximum value of the gauge, default is 100.

min.description: Minimum value of the gauge, default is 0.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

title.description: Set the title of the chart.

width.description: Set the width of the chart, default is 800px.
